header_text: You were denied a promotion this year and know that your friend was rooting for you to get a promotion. They frown when you tell them about not getting one. You tell them that you worked extremely hard despite not getting a promotion, and they are proud of the effort you gave throughout the year.

elements.Text: Is your friend disappointed that you did not get the promotion?

elements.name: You were denied a promotion this year and know that your friend was rooting for you to get a promotion. They frown when you tell them about not getting one.
